summary:
A blog is a website where people write and share their thoughts, like an online diary. It's usually a single person or a small group writing about a specific topic, like sports or art. Blogs are like reverse timelines, with the newest posts at the top.

In the past, only tech-savvy people could create blogs, but now, anyone can do it with easy-to-use tools. Blogs have grown into social media, allowing readers to comment and interact. They can also be used by companies, newspapers, and even for education. There are millions of blogs on the internet today, covering all kinds of subjects.
title: Blog
